column1: Table A-178:  Total Methane Emissions from Livestock Manure Management (kt) a,b
a Accounts for CH4 reductions due to capture and destruction of CH4 at facilities using anaerobic digesters.

b Disaggregated poultry values (e.g., Broilers, Turkeys, etc.) have not been estimated for the current (1990 through 2019) Inventory. It will be updated for the next (1990 through 2020) Inventory submission.
